name: World Robotics, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Congress
content: World Robotics, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Congress which is going to take place during Dec 16-17, 2024 Osaka, Japan. AIM-2024 provides an unique platform for all the leading professionals and will feature a plenary session, Keynote session, parallel topical sessions, and poster session, Mark your calendar today and plan to attend. We bring the globally immense information from Robotics, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning fields under one roof with diversified Knowledge oriented scientific sessions which widen professional contact and create new opportunities in the ocean of knowledge.
